goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there is a fragile object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a rigid object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: it is prohibited to lift and relocate a container
rules.2: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin before
rules.3: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.4: when a soft object in the bin at the initial state, out of the soft object and replace it into the bin
